#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    long long int t; char s[1000000]; long long int L, LO, an0nh4x0r;
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%s", s);
        L = LO = an0nh4x0r = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < strlen(s); ++i){
            if (s[i] == 'L'){
                L += 1; an0nh4x0r += LO;
            }
            if (s[i] == 'O'){
                LO += L;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n", an0nh4x0r);
    }
    return 0;
}
